import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react'; import reactDom from "react-dom" import Login from '../accounts/Login'; import Register from '../accounts/Register'; import './LoginModal.css' import { CgClose } from 'react-icons/all' export default function LoginModal({ open, action, onClose, onSubmit}) { console.log("Action type: ", typeof action) const [modalType, setModalType] = useState({action}); console.log("Modal type", modalType) if (!open) return null if (modalType == "login") { return reactDom.createPortal( <>

New to Reddit? setModalType("register")}>SIGN UP

, document.getElementById('portal') ) } else if (modalType == "register") { return reactDom.createPortal( <>

Already have an account? setModalType("login")}>Log In

, document.getElementById('portal') ) } }
